评论概述: You may want to size up
评论详情: I love this dress, it’s super comfortable. However, if you are a C cup or above, you are definitely going to want to size up one or maybe even two sizes. It’s also a brighter color purple in person, but it’s still pretty.
I absolutely loved the look of this dress and it worked out great for my witch costume! The dress did dye my skin blue so that was the only con i had but overall amazing!
Super comfy look! Used for my Ghost Face outfit and as a cute look for day to day :) Paired it with a crop hoodie from Target and some boots 🖤
fits perfectly, i'm 129lb and 5" and ordered a medium!  It will be perfect for the Edgar Allen Poe Speakeasy i'm wearing it to!

The size is not true. I ordered an XL like i was suggested and it looks and fits like a medium. Dress is also not flattering for bigger chested girls. Fabric is alright. Its your average cheap velvet.
The company may tell you to size up, but from experience it usually runs true to size
I got a size 2x and it fit like a medium. The fabric was okay but nothing fancy.

True to the pics this dress is so pretty and such a stylish little piece! I have worn it several times though all different events and it has held up so I would say it’s a great quality and well made. Super comfy and flattering. True to size

To be honest I did feel underexcited, It was cute but felt like more of a Halloween costume, than something I could wear to an event. The material wasn't as nice as it looked in the photo, the color was a lighter purple. It was cute, but didn't fit what I was going. for, so I did end up returning it. That said, others might like it!
Nice quality, it's a velvet with lace accents. I moves nicely with I walked around and was a little stretchy too. Which is always nice.
Fits perfectly only problem was a strap missing the hook for it to loop on
Bought dress for my son's girlfriend for Christmas.  It was soft, and cute. She said it fits good and she's super happy with it.

I am reviewing this on my grandma's account, as she bought this dress for me. To start off with, this dress is pretty size inclusive!! It's rare I find pretty dresses in my style that fit me, but this one fit me perfectly! I bought an XL and it worked great. The dress looks beautiful and also is very comfortable! I am autistic and have sensory issues, and had no issue with this dress. Comfy and paired great with the crown I got for my birthday! I'm going to wear this trick or treating! I recommend this dress to anyone thinking about buying ❤️
Liked the look of the dress.  The chest area is a little loose, it does have adjustable straps, but I don’t like snug dress around armpit area.  Returning.

Such a pretty dress! I was iffy on whether it’d fit or not (I’m somewhere around size 18/20) but it fit beautifully, it’s comfortable not too tight, feels nice on and it doesn’t show every lump and bump even with it being form fitting, it gives such a nice hourglass figure too, definitely recommend.
buy it, it’s so adorable and i wore it to my schools homecoming last year
Super comfortable and looks just like the pics. It's stretching and light. So far I'd say great quality and the price for the dress is a great deal
Dress ran small. I am unable to wear it until I lose weight. Disappointed

Ok I am so happy I purchased this! I really didn’t know what to expect but it’s a lot cuter than I thought. And it fits me great! I will say the cups part is a bit small, so if you’re big chested like me, there will be lots of cleavage. If you don’t mind that, go for it!
I bought this for myself and it’s very comfortable, fits great, and I have washed it multiple times. (Make sure it’s on delicate though) but it holds up and fits great. True to size.
It isn't that cute irl... unflattering.
Very sexy!
Very comfortable, fits great, easy to get on, love the color

So I bought this for Halloween since I wanted to make my own witchy outfit. Afterwards, I ended up wearing this dress for a Måneskin concert which worked out just fine! It’s super comfortable! I weigh about 130 lbs and I’m 5’2 and ordered a medium. Hopefully that helps someone!

My daughter picked this out for homecoming.  I was hesitant because of it being so inexpensive.  It came on time and I was shocked at how nice it is for the price. She rocked it with some combat boots!

Incredibly cute and comfortable. The fit was perfect and I felt that the length of the skirt is right in my comfort zone of being not to too short, but still short enough to be fun. It falls maybe half way down my thigh, but I'm also 5'2" The only flaw is that the moon charm fell off after a couple of wears.

评论概述: Super cute and worth the money!!
评论详情: I absolutely loved this dress, it's super cute and comfy! 100% did not regret getting it

评论概述: Said medium would fit best but so tight it's like a small
评论详情: Sizing is way off

My daughter loves this dress, but the fit was a bit snug. The lace isn't great quality, and the dress is a smidge thin.  Overall it's a good purchase though, especially for the price! Just maybe size up...

评论概述: How it fits and care tips
评论详情: I think this dress is perfect however I got my size and it was still a little tight on the upper body (breast,armpits, and stomach). But if you wear pasteies with it you should be fine. Also hand wash this item in cold water DO NOT USE FABRIC SOFTENER and hand dry
I ordered a large and it is waaaaay too small. Can barely fit over my boobs and ass…

Very cute dress. I normally wear a large and ordered a large based off reviews and size chart. However, I really should’ve gotten an XL. It’s much longer than anticipated so I’ll likely be hemming the bottom to make it shorter. I’m 5’9 150 pounds.
It fits perfectly, and I love the fabric!
I love this dress so much that I bought it in purple and black! It has stretch but is fitted.
great but the charm fell off straight away but i sewed it back on and it's fine

评论概述: Fits great except for boob wise
评论详情: I loved it but it did not fit well chest wise it's ment for our smaller chested friends for sure

Suuuper soft and very comfy. Fit perfectly as well and stretchy. I’ve been eyeing this dress for awhile and I wish I would’ve gotten it sooner. If your thinking about getting it just do it it’s absolutely lovely ❤️
fits really well. I'm 5'3 and 113 pounds and a small fits perfectly. Good quality too. I love this dress!!
My 17 year old loves her new "Goth" dress. It fit her well for her 5'1 average frame. The dress is soft, well made and true to picture.
My daughter LOVES it!

This is one of the best clothing items I have gotten from Amazon it came a day early and it came in the right size range my only complaint is the velvet is not the best quality so dust sticks onto it pretty easily but otherwise I’d say it’s worth the money!

This dress was so comfy and cute! I love the material it’s made of and it made my “girls” look FANTASTIC. I am 5’2” and about 140 lbs and the fit was perfect!
